item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Compatible # React â€” ReactJS React Native â€” React Native for mobile Installation # Using Yarn yarn add @resourge/react-form Using npm npm install @resourge/react-form --save Schema validation with Yup # ðŸ’¡ Only needed when using Yup as schema validation To simplify the process of converting errors from diferent validation packages like joi, yup, zod, ajv, etc to useForm hook lookalike errors, use setDefaultOnError. You only need to setup this on the initialization of the application in this case App.
